name: DKPTracker
short_description:
There is only 1 "slash" command: /dkpt. ( without the period ) This will bring up the raid screen, from which you can select your raids at the top ( where it says "Select..." ), create new raids ( text field right below that with the button next to it ), and update raid members ( the rest of the screen, derp! ).

Currently:
- tracks raids ( up to 20)
=> for more than 20 people in a raid ( subs, etc ), just create a separate raid for now.
- tracks member names and their associated loot value ( DKP, EREG, etc )
- add/delete raids
- add/update/delete members

TODO:

- automated updates based on certain criteria ( send me ideas on when this should be updated please. Right now I am just thinking of when kills happen in a dungeon)
summary: A simple raid loot addon for Rift.
